#include "../deptran/__dep__.h"
#include "server.h"
#include "../deptran/raft/server.h"
#include "client.h"

namespace janus {

static int volatile x1 =
    MarshallDeputy::RegInitializer(MarshallDeputy::CMD_MULTI_STRING,
                                     [] () -> Marshallable* {
                                       return new MultiStringMarshallable;
                                     });

int64_t KvServer::GetNextOpId() {
  verify(sp_log_svr_);
  int64_t ret = sp_log_svr_->site_id_;
  ret = ret << 32;
  ret = ret + op_id_cnt_++; 
  return ret;
}



int KvServer::Put(const uint64_t& oid, 
                  const string& k,
                  const string& v) {
  /* 
  Your are recommended to use MultiStringMarshallable as the format 
  for the log entries. Here is an example how you can use it.
  auto s = make_shared<MultiStringMarshallable>();
  s->data_.push_back(to_string(op_id));
  s->data_.push_back("put");
  s->data_.push_back(k);
  s->data_.push_back(v);
  */
  /* your code here */
  RaftServer& raft = GetRaftServer(); 

  uint64_t ret_term = 0;
  uint64_t ret_index = 0;
  bool is_leader = false;

  (&raft)->GetState(&is_leader, &ret_term);

  if(!is_leader) {
    std::cout<<"not leader in the put" << std::endl;
    return KV_NOTLEADER;
  }

  auto s = make_shared<MultiStringMarshallable>();
  s->data_.push_back(to_string(oid));
  s->data_.push_back("put");
  s->data_.push_back(k);
  s->data_.push_back(v);

  shared_ptr<Marshallable> cmd = s;
  (&raft)->Start(cmd, &ret_index, &ret_term);

  Coroutine::Sleep(400000);
  if (data_set.find(s->data_) != data_set.end()) {
    std::cout<<"KV success in the put" << std::endl;
    return KV_SUCCESS;
  }
  std::cout<<"KV timeout in the put" << std::endl;
  return KV_TIMEOUT;
}

int KvServer::Append(const uint64_t& oid, 
                     const string& k,
                     const string& v) {
  /* your code here */
  RaftServer& raft = this->GetRaftServer();

  uint64_t ret_term = 0;
  uint64_t ret_index = 0;
  bool is_leader = false;

  (&raft)->GetState(&is_leader, &ret_term);

  if(!is_leader) {
    std::cout<<"not leader in the append" << std::endl;
    return KV_NOTLEADER;
  }

  auto s = make_shared<MultiStringMarshallable>();
  s->data_.push_back(to_string(oid));
  s->data_.push_back("append");
  s->data_.push_back(k);
  s->data_.push_back(v);

  shared_ptr<Marshallable> cmd = s;
  (&raft)->Start(cmd, &ret_index, &ret_term);

  Coroutine::Sleep(400000);
  if (data_set.find(s->data_) != data_set.end()) {
    std::cout<<"KV success in the append" << std::endl;
    return KV_SUCCESS;
  }
  std::cout<<"KV timeout in the append" << std::endl;


  return KV_TIMEOUT;
}

int KvServer::Get(const uint64_t& oid, 
                  const string& k,
                  string* v) {
  /* your code here */
  RaftServer& raft = GetRaftServer(); 

  uint64_t ret_term = 0;
  uint64_t ret_index = 0;
  bool is_leader = false;

  (&raft)->GetState(&is_leader, &ret_term);

  if(!is_leader) {
    std::cout<<"not leader in the get" << std::endl;
    return KV_NOTLEADER;
  }

  auto s = make_shared<MultiStringMarshallable>();
  s->data_.push_back(to_string(oid));
  s->data_.push_back("get");
  s->data_.push_back(k);
  s->data_.push_back(*v);

  shared_ptr<Marshallable> cmd = s;
  (&raft)->Start(cmd, &ret_index, &ret_term);

  Coroutine::Sleep(400000);
  if (data_set.find(s->data_) != data_set.end()) {
    *v = key_value_pair[s->data_[2]];
    std::cout<<"KV success in the get and the value is " << *v << std::endl;
    return KV_SUCCESS;
  }
  std::cout<<"KV timeout in the get" << std::endl;
  return KV_TIMEOUT;
}

void KvServer::OnNextCommand(Marshallable& m) {
  auto v = (MultiStringMarshallable*)(&m);
  int op = v->data_[1] == "get" ? get : v->data_[1] == "put" ? put : v->data_[1] == "append" ? append : unknown;

  switch (op) {
    case get:
      v->data_[3] = (key_value_pair[v->data_[2]]);
      break;
    case put:
      key_value_pair[v->data_[2]] = v->data_[3];
      break;
    case append:
      key_value_pair[v->data_[2]] = key_value_pair.find(v->data_[2]) == key_value_pair.end() ? v->data_[3] : key_value_pair[v->data_[2]] + v->data_[3];
      break;
    case unknown:
      break;
  }
  data_set.insert(v->data_);
}

shared_ptr<KvClient> KvServer::CreateClient() {
  /* don't change this function */
  auto cli = make_shared<KvClient>();
  verify(commo_ != nullptr);
  cli->commo_ = commo_;
  uint32_t id = sp_log_svr_->site_id_;
  id = id << 16;
  cli->cli_id_ = id+cli_cnt_++; 
  return cli;
}

} // namespace janus;
